name: Dakota the RPG
description:
An experimental role-playing game by Jason Harlan

Three different main characters from three different worlds

There's ANNA, the aspiring rock and roller, who wants to get her brother something special for his birthday.

DAKOTA, the laid-back loner, whose isolated lifestyle is starting to make him a bit restless.

And the WHITE KNIGHT, a brave paladin, who is doing everything he can to keep the King happy,

Until the day the GRAND ROLE-PLAYING GAME EXPOSITION came to town...

...changing their lives - and their worlds - forever.

Along the way questions will arise.

Cliches will be examined.

And friends will be made.

Join them on a surreal and mystical journey across mulitple consoles.

A 16-bit role-playing game. Intertwining narratives. Turn-based battles. A variety of pixel-art styles.  A loyal dog companion. Collectible Tarot cards. Mutated vegetables. Robots, squirrels, and so much more can be found in...

Dakota the RPG

What is available here is a demo with about five or so hours of gameplay.

My personal website can be found here: https://harlancore.blogspot.com/
